name: MeekanSDK
summary: Wrapper for Meekan's REST API - Schedule meetings easily.
description:
Meekan is a cross-vendor meeting scheduling platform.
	
	It allows users to schedule meetings with other participants using its unique
	scheduling engine.
	Sharing availabilities across organizations, handling multiple identities and
	calendar providers, and finding the best time for a meeting.
